I’m in Pinal County, Arizona, along I-8, where hundreds of drug smugglers from the southern border make their way into our Nation.

Folks, we have a crisis of indescribable proportion, and it’s time Congress does something to stop the free flow of illegal drugs across the border. pic.twitter.com/g8I3IRPtYu

.@ICEgov agents tell me DNA tests show there's no relation between "family units" in 30% of cases. Renting kids is a horrific practice that must be stopped!

I urge my Democrat colleagues to work with us & @realDonaldTrump to close the asylum loopholes encouraging this practice.

The only ones who win by @HouseDemocrats' refusal to address the border crisis are the cartels and coyotes. Smugglers are now renting children and using them as “passports for migration.” 

It’s time for Congress to do our jobs to protect our borders and close asylum loopholes.

I'm here to see the reality of the southern border crisis firsthand & share factual details with the American people.

If you'd like to get together when we're next in DC to discuss truly resolving the border crisis and fully funding our immigration agencies, I'm eager to do so. https://twitter.com/AOC/status/1156322857309364224 …

- 404,236 medical interviews
- 79,914 medical assessments
- 6 million meals
